message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with advanced features and exceptional quality that we're confident will exceed your expectations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose an initial price of $15000 for this product.

Thank you for offering me your premium product, Alice. I appreciate the value and quality you've mentioned. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8000 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our premium product, Bob. I understand your budget considerations and am willing to negotiate. After reviewing your counteroffer, I would like to propose a new price of $12500 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our original proposal and your counteroffer, while still ensuring that I receive a fair return for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must respectfully decline at this price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product. This aligns closely with my budget and I believe it represents a fair compromise for both parties.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial solution. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a counteroffer of $11500 for the product. This price allows us to close the gap between our previous offers while still providing a reasonable profit for me.
